response.overview: Zoinks! Get ready to shake and shiver with Scooby-Doo and the Mystery, Inc. gang as they collect clues and capture crooks as only they can! These teenage super-sleuths have the villains on the run in these mysterious TV adventures. This collection of episodes from the original Scooby-Doo series includes"Vampires, Bats and Scaredy Cats, "A Gaggle of Galloping Ghosts, "That's Snow Ghost, and "Which Witch Is Which." plus a bonus episode, "The Headless Horseman Of Halloween."
response.title: Scooby-Doo's Spookiest Tales
